msbt.message: OK. What ya do here is ya stand in front of the cake and blow out the candles with !
Hurry and blow out the candles with .
I'm gonna hold my eyes open so I don't blink and miss it when you blow out those candles with !Hurry, though. I don't want my eyeballs to dry out.
You seem a little different today.Oh, I know what it is It's because you're older than you were yesterday, !
Piñatas are so fun! You got so many birthday cupcakes too!Um, ? Do you need help eating them, ?
I just love birthday decorations! They're like holiday decorations, but for cake
We were talking about your presentI said we oughta getcha one year's supply of . Or a 50- gallon drum of .But everyone else said I was just suggesting stuff that I wanted for myself!
A huh huh huh It's my birthday today too! You know what the odds are of that?<10_4 /> One in 365! Crazy, huh?
? It's my birthday today too!Wait Did you copy my birthday?!Oh man, that's not cool.Naaaah, I'm just mess'n with ya. Happy birthday, .
Having your birthday on New Year's sounds like it'd be really fun!Happy New Year!<10_4 /> Happy birthday!<10_4 /> That's a lotta "happy" going around.

Having your birthday on February 29th sounds so coolYour birthday is, like, this rare and magical event, right?Wild. Justwild. A huh huh huh.Hey, listen—there's no February 29th this year, but don't worry! We're still gonna celebrate!

It's an extra special day for someone with their birthday on February 29th. You're so lucky, .Like, once every four years, you get to say, "Hey. I'm cooler than any of ya. Check out my real cool birthday."But you don't do that 'cause you're too cool to flaunt your awesome birthday.
So, your birthday's ? That's easy to remember. Even I can't forget a date like that!, thanks for having a birthday with matching numbers!
It must be real cool to have your birthday this time of year. It's like all those decorations are for you.

Today's a wild day to have a birthday, huh? I mean, it coulda been any day at all, but this is the one ya got!, you're lucky. A lotta folks don't have this birthday. A lotta real un-cool folks Like me!For serious though. I got a bad case of birthday jealousy right here.
Isn't that piñata real nice? , we made it as a cool surprise for you!
Whaddaya think is inside that piñata?<10_4 /> A huh huh, it's a surprise!
I hope you whack open that piñata real quick It's fulla secret snackies!
